TRANS_ADMIN_LOGIN_FORM_REMINDER: This section is for administrator only. If you dont have permission to access, please return to home page
TRANS_LOGIN_SUCCESS: Login successfully. Your data have been processing, please wait a bit...
TRANS_LOGIN_FAILURE: Invalid Authentication. Please check your email and password
TRANS_LOGOUT_SUCCESS: Successfully logout from the session. Thank you for using our application.
TRANS_LOGOUT_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to logout from the current session?
TRANS_LOGOUT_CONFIRM_EXPLAIN: You can continue to use the application without the need of login, but some features will be disabled.
TRANS_EMAIL_INVALID: Your email must be between 5 and 100 characters long and look like an e-mail address
TRANS_EMAIL_INVALID_MINLENGTH: Email must be longer than 5 characters
TRANS_EMAIL_INVALID_MAXLENGTH: Email must be shorter than 100 characters
TRANS_EMAIL_INVALID_FORMAT: Email must look like an e-mail address
TRANS_PASSWORD_INVALID: Password must be between 5 to 30 characters long
TRANS_PASSWORD_INVALID_MINLENGTH: Password must be longer than 5 characters
TRANS_PASSWORD_INVALID_MAXLENGTH: Password must be shorter than 30 characters
TRANS_PROJECT_EMPTY_ATM: There is no project to display at the moment
TRANS_INVESTOR_EMPTY_ATM: There is no investor to display  at the moment
